column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Soft-scrambled eggs were described as "mushy eggs" by my sister
column2: but I thought they weren't bad.  I wouldn't get them again
column3: as they are slowly cooked in a skillet with a healthy dose of butter
column4: but it was a good experience :D  It was garnished with tasty fried flower blossoms~
